item.title: You know you are going to be up late today when...
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
I believe you are referring to the fact that Coca Cola got its name from the fact that it had cocaine in it? Most soft drinks when they started had some form of drug and where marketed as medicine.

Also you fail, I can drink a 12 pack of soda before sleeping and it has no effect. I have built a tolerance to large amounts of caffeine

Read full topic

Funny fact: before there was a soda named cocaine, it contained cocaine… until it was made illegal!
